pages.text: &eBounty Hunting&r is a Mine and Slash Profession which levels up as you complete Bountiful bounties. Complete bounties to earn Bounty Hunting experience and &eBounty Slips&r!

&eBounty Boards&r will generate &erandom bounties&r for you to complete. Take out a &erequest&r from the board's interface and complete it within the &etime limit&r to earn the listed rewards. As you complete bounties, your &ereputation&r (tied to that Bounty Board block) will increase, increasing the level of rewards. Empowered Bounty Slips will start appearing at 45 reputation!

As you level your Bounty Hunting, you will gain access to more purchasable rewards in the &eProfession Shop&r. Items in this shop are purchasable with &eBounty Slips&r! The shop can be accessed with &eDefault Key: P, or the menu wheel&r.

Craft &eDecrees&r to give new quest types to the board per decree type, which is randomly determined.
Through Bounty Hunting you will be able to gain &eTiered Meats&r (&7Spritual&r, &aCelestial&r. &9Emyprean&r, &dAngelic&r, &6Divine&r, and &5Godly&r) to be used in Cooking.
